channel.title: Posts on G.H. Beckett's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on G.H. Beckett's blog

item.title: Static websites are cool
item.description: Static websites are cool Using Hugo to host my static blog Hello {every,no-}one, Writing the first entry for every blog is much more difficult than I first thought (having to rewrite this first sentence for the tenth time proves this to me). With an audience consisting of literally just one person, yourself, it's a bit like shouting into the void. Whilst it can clear your head, allowing you to put your thoughts in order, the notice of nobody hearing what you said makes it a bit sad.
